turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: My wireless earbuds, the AirBlasts, aren't connecting to my phone. I've tried everything! This is so frustrating.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let's troubleshoot this. First, can you confirm that Bluetooth is enabled on your phone and that the AirBlasts are charged?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, Bluetooth is on and the earbuds are fully charged. I even tried restarting my phone. Still nothing!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay. Have you tried 'forgetting' the AirBlasts in your phone's Bluetooth settings and then re-pairing them?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yep, tried that too. Several times. Is there some sort of reset button on the earbuds themselves that I'm missing? Because I'm about to throw these things across the room.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Please don't throw them! There is a reset procedure. Please press and hold the multi-function button on *both* earbuds simultaneously for 15 seconds. The LED indicator should flash red three times to confirm the reset. Then try pairing them again. Let me know if that works.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I tried that. And... I think it worked! They're showing up now. Finally! Thanks. Although, why isn't this in the instruction manual? Seems pretty important.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the omission in the manual. We are working to improve our documentation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? Glad we could get it working!
